item.title: EP 190 - The Man Who Wanted A Nuclear War
item.itunes:title: The Man Who Wanted A Nuclear War
item.description:
A man who died in an almost unbelievable way, a cryptid/ghost that farts its way into your brain, and the political mess that was Posadism all are covered today on Dead Rabbit Radio!
